Uses of Class
cis.project1.Player

    • Uses of Player in cis.project1

      Methods in cis.project1 that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Player CanadianSaladModel.getCurrentPlayer()
      This getter method returns the player whose turn it is.
      Player Trick.getStarter()
      This getter method returns the Player who started "this" Trick object by playing the first card.
      Player Trick.getTaker()
      This getter method returns the player who is losing "this" Trick object.
      protected Player CanadianSaladModel.getUserPlayer()
      This helper method gets the player object representing the user.
      Methods in cis.project1 that return types with arguments of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.LinkedList<Player> CanadianSaladModel.getPlayers()
      This getter method returns the collection of players.
      Methods in cis.project1 with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Trick.add​(Card newCard, Player p)
      This method adds the specified card to the trick on behalf of the specified player.
      void CanadianSaladModel.setCurrentPlayer​(Player p)
      This setter method sets the player whose turn it is.
      Constructors in cis.project1 with parameters of type Player 
      Constructor Description
      Trick​(Player firstPlayer)
      This constructor creates a Trick object with the specified first player, and leading card.
      Trick​(Player firstPlayer, Card led)
      This constructor creates a Trick object with the specified first player, and leading card.
      Constructor parameters in cis.project1 with type arguments of type Player 
      Constructor Description
      CanadianSaladModel​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> players)
      This constructor creates a CanadianSaladModel object that simulates the trick-taking card game Canadian Salad.
